mapper.select: select mi.score from mark_info mi inner join index_info ii on ii.index_id = mi.index_id inner join evaluation_info ei on ei.evaluation_id = mi.evaluation_id where ei.teacher_id = #{teacherId} and ii.index_id = #{indexId} and ei.course_id = #{courseId}

select ii.index_name as name,avg(mi.score) as value from mark_info mi inner join index_info ii on ii.index_id = mi.index_id inner join evaluation_info ei on ei.evaluation_id = mi.evaluation_id where ei.teacher_id = #{teacherId} and ei.course_id = #{courseId} group by ii.index_id union all select '最终分数',sum(value * weight) from ( select avg(mi.score) as value,ii.weight from mark_info mi inner join index_info ii on ii.index_id = mi.index_id inner join evaluation_info ei on ei.evaluation_id = mi.evaluation_id where ei.teacher_id = #{teacherId} and ei.course_id = #{courseId} group by ii.index_id) value;

select ei.student_id,si.std_name as studentName, ei.teacher_id,ti.th_name as teacherName, ei.course_id,ci.cos_name as courseName, ii.index_name, ii.weight, mi.score from mark_info mi inner join index_info ii on ii.index_id = mi.index_id inner join evaluation_info ei on ei.evaluation_id = mi.evaluation_id inner join student_info si on ei.student_id = si.std_id inner join teacher_info ti on ei.teacher_id = ti.th_id inner join course_info ci on ei.course_id = ci.cos_id
